entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to a few flurries this evening and ending before morning then cloudy. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 3.
